title: Hotlanta: Flaming Hot Flights Available Between Atlanta and Los Angeles
text:
Hotlanta: Flaming Hot Flights Available Between Atlanta and Los Angeles August 20, 2015 09:50 ET | Source: Spirit Airlines 
MIRAMAR, Fla., Aug. 20,   The "Hot" in "Hotlanta" refers to the many wonderful activities to do in Atlanta. Los Angeles is world renowned for its night life, beaches, and beautiful people. Now, more people can live it up in Atlanta and Los Angeles while saving money because, starting today, Spirit Airlines (NASDAQ: SAVE ) is offering convenient nonstop service that makes traveling between Atlanta and Los Angeles more affordable than ever. 
"Spirit continues to grow in Atlanta and Los Angeles, liberating these cities from their high airfares," said Mark Kopczak, Spirit Airlines' Vice President of Network Planning. "We like to listen to what our customer want and make it happen." 
As part of the planned growth in these cities, Spirit will also start new service from Atlanta to/from Boston and Fort Myers on September 10, 2015. Spirit will also offer nonstop service from Los Angeles to/from Oakland starting on November 12, 2015. This expansion will allow more travelers to take advantage of Spirit's Bare Fare™ with Frill Control™. 
Spirit Airlines offers nonstop service out of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport to Atlantic City, Boston, Baltimore/Washington DC, Cleveland, Dallas, Detroit, Fort Lauderdale, Houston, Las Vegas, Orlando, Chicago, Philadelphia, Fort Myers and Tampa. 
Out of the Los Angeles International Airport, Spirit Airlines offers service to 13 destinations. These destinations are Atlanta, Baltimore/Washington DC, Cleveland, Denver, Dallas, Detroit, Fort Lauderdale, Houston, Las Vegas, Kansas City, Minneapolis, Oakland and Chicago. 
Customers can check out the flight schedules, crazy low fares, and vacation packages available for this new service and to all Spirit's destinations at www.spirit.com . 
About Spirit Airlines: 
Spirit Airlines (NASDAQ: SAVE ) is committed to offering the lowest total price to the places we fly, on average much lower than other airlines, on average nearly 40% less* Our customers start with an unbundled, stripped-down Bare Fare™ and get Frill Control™ which allows them to pay only for the options they choose – like bags, seat assignments and refreshments – the things other airlines bake right into their ticket prices. We help people save money and travel more often, create new jobs and stimulate business growth in the communities we serve. With our modern and fuel-efficient all-Airbus fleet, we operate more than 350 daily flights to more than 57 destinations in the U.S., Latin America and the Caribbean. Come save with us at www.spirit.com . 
*U.S. Department of Transportation statistics
